title: U.S. advanced flat glass prices in 1999 and 2019 by glass type
summary: In 2019 , Smart_glass was the operating manager ( advanced or distribution system operator ) with the highest flat glass in the Dutch U.S. flat .
The U.S. has a single U.S. flat , where taxes are imposed on a national basis .
The country 's distribution network , however operates on different regional levels .
gold: This statistic shows theadvanced flat glass prices in the United States in 1999 , and forecast figures for 2019 . In 1999 , safety glass cost 4.08 dollars per square foot .
